title: RuPaul's Drag Race Contestant Data
description:
Description
These are contestant-level data for RuPaul's Drag Race for all available seasons
(currently through Season 14). Data include all sorts of information.
reference: Note: Cynthia Lee Fontaine, Shangela, Eureka O'Hara, and Vanessa Vanjie Mateo will appear in this data set twice.

parameters.contestant: a character vector for contestant's name, by season
parameters.age: a numeric vector for the respondent's purported age as of filming
parameters.dob: a date vector for the contestant's purported date of birth

format: A data frame with the following 5 variables.
